chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
Y: Type
f: X -> Y
P: Y -> Prop
ll: list X

Goal:
Forall P (map f ll) <-> Forall (fun x : X => P (f x)) ll

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Forall : forall A : Type, (A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
map_ext_in_iff : map ?f ?l = map ?g ?l < -> (forall a : ?A, In a ?l -> ?f a = ?g a) where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y P : Y -> Prop ll : list X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y P : Y -> Prop ll : list X |- Type] ?f : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y P : Y -> Prop ll : list X |- ?A -> ?B] ?g : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y P : Y -> Prop ll : list X |- ?A -> ?B] ?l : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y P : Y -> Prop ll : list X |- list ?A]
Forall2_map_right : forall (X Y Z : Type) (R : Y -> X -> Prop) (f : Z -> X) (mm : list Y) (ll : list Z), Forall2 R mm (map f ll) < -> Forall2 (fun (y : Y) (x : Z) => R y (f x)) mm ll
Forall_cons_inv : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (x : X) (ll : list X), Forall P (x :: ll) < -> P x /\ Forall P ll
Forall_rev : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (ll : list X), Forall P ll -> Forall P (rev ll)
Forall2_map_left : forall (X Y Z : Type) (R : Y -> X -> Prop) (f : Z -> Y) (ll : list Z) (mm : list X), Forall2 R (map f ll) mm < -> Forall2 (fun (x : Z) (y : X) => R (f x) y) ll mm
Forall2_map_both : forall (X Y X' Y' : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (f : X' -> X) (g : Y' -> Y) (ll : list X') (mm : list Y'), Forall2 R (map f ll) (map g mm) < -> Forall2 (fun (x : X') (y : Y') => R (f x) (g y)) ll mm
Forall2_Forall : forall (X : Type) (R : X -> X -> Prop) (ll : list X), Forall2 R ll ll < -> Forall (fun x : X => R x x) ll
Forall_app : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (ll mm : list X), Forall P (ll ++ mm) < -> Forall P ll /\ Forall P mm
list_injective_map : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X), (forall x y : X, f x = f y -> x = y) -> list_injective ll -> list_injective (map f ll)
Forall_fold_right : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall P l < -> fold_right (fun x : A => and (P x)) True l
flat_map_single : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (l : list X), flat_map (fun x : X => f x :: nil) l = map f l
Forall_and : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall P l -> Forall Q l -> Forall (fun x : A => P x /\ Q x) l
Forall_and_inv : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall (fun x : A => P x /\ Q x) l -> Forall P l /\ Forall Q l
map_cst_rev : forall (X Y : Type) (y : Y) (ll : list X), map (fun _ : X => y) (rev ll) = map (fun _ : X => y) ll
Exists_Forall_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, P x \/ ~ P x) -> Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l < -> ~ Forall P l
Forall_Exists_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall (fun x : A => ~ P x) l < -> ~ Exists P l
list_assoc : forall X Y : Type, eqdec X -> X -> list (X * Y) -> option Y
neg_Forall_Exists_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> ~ Forall P l -> Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l
map_map : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : B -> C) (l : list A), map g (map f l) = map (fun x : A => g (f x)) l
List.Forall_app : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), Forall P (l1 ++ l2) < -> Forall P l1 /\ Forall P l2
Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l)
map_cons_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X) (y : Y) (m : list Y), map f ll = y :: m -> {x : X & {l : list X | ll = x :: l /\ f x = y /\ map f l = m}}
list_injective : forall X : Type, list X -> Prop
map_cst_repeat : forall (X Y : Type) (y : Y) (ll : list X), map (fun _ : X => y) ll = list_repeat y (length ll)
exists_Forall : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (l : list B), (exists k : A, Forall (P k) l) -> Forall (fun x : B => exists k : A, P k x) l
Forall_forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall P l < -> (forall x : A, In x l -> P x)
map_middle_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X) (m : list Y) (y : Y) (n : list Y), map f ll = m ++ y :: n -> {l : list X & {x : X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ x :: r /\ map f l = m /\ f x = y /\ map f r = n}}}
list_injective_rect : forall (X : Type) (P : list X -> Type), P nil -> (forall (x : X) (l : list X), ~ In x l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list X, list_injective l -> P l
notin_flat_map_Forall : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (x : B) (l : list A), ~ In x (flat_map f l) < -> Forall (fun y : A => ~ In x (f y)) l
map_app_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X) (m n : list Y), map f ll = m ++ n -> {l : list X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ r /\ m = map f l /\ n = map f r}}

```coq
```coq
intros X Y f P ll.
split; intros H.
  apply Forall2_map_right with (R:=P).
  intros; rewrite H; auto.
  rewrite Forall2_map_both with (f:=f) (g:=id); auto.
  apply Forall2_Forall; auto.
  apply Forall_cons_inv in H as [H1 H2].
  split; [apply H1 | apply H2].
  apply Forall2_map_left with (R:=P).
  intros; rewrite H; auto.
  rewrite Forall2_map_both with (f:=id) (g:=f); auto.
  apply Forall2_Forall; auto.
Qed.```
